The one-time event Illithid Invasion is active across all servers! See here for more!

Cloth Armor Light Armor Medium Armor Heavy Armor Docents
Item Enchantments ML AC MDB ACP ASF Material Bind Quests
Aberrant Robe
  • Armor Bonus +5Armor Bonus +5: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +5 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Spell Resistance +17 Spell Resistance +17: +17 Enhancement bonus to Spell Resistance.
  • Wizardry IIWizardry II: This item grants the wearer +50 maximum spell points. Sorcerers and Favored Souls gain up to double spell points from items.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 6 0 None 0 0% ClothCloth: Cloth is a very common material used in handwraps, robes, outfits. and other accessories. Bound to Character on EquipBound to Character on Equip: This item is Bound to Character on Equip Caverns of Korromar, End Chest (R'zzix the Beholder)
Alchemical Apprentice's Robe
  • Concentration +1Concentration +1: Passive: +1 Competence bonus to the Concentration skill.
  • Mage ArmorMage Armor
    Caster level: 1
    Charges: 1 (1/day)     — 1 Charges (Recharged/Day:1)
  • StarterStarter: Starter equipment cannot be traded, sold or crafted.
    This item cannot be fed to sentient jewels.
 1 +0 None 0 0% ClothCloth: Cloth is a very common material used in handwraps, robes, outfits. and other accessories. Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire The Grotto, Sahuagin High Priestess's chest
Antithesis
  • Armor Bonus +6Armor Bonus +6: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +6 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Protection +4Protection +4: Passive: +4 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Resistance +4 Resistance +4: Passive: +4 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Fire Guard IIFire Guard II: When Hit in Melee: Deals 2 to 8 Fire damage to your attacker.
  • Ice Guard IIIce Guard II: When Hit in Melee: Deals 2 to 8 Cold damage to your attacker.
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 12 0 None 0 0% ClothCloth: Cloth is a very common material used in handwraps, robes, outfits. and other accessories. Bound to Character on EquipBound to Character on Equip: This item is Bound to Character on Equip Inferno of the Damned, End Chest
Apprentice's Robe
  • Concentration +1Concentration +1: Passive: +1 Competence bonus to the Concentration skill.
  • Lesser Arcane Augmentation ILesser Arcane Augmentation I: Increases the wearer's caster level when casting first level sorcerer or wizard spells by one.
  • StarterStarter: Starter equipment cannot be traded, sold or crafted.
    This item cannot be fed to sentient jewels.
 1 +0 None 0 0% ClothCloth: Cloth is a very common material used in handwraps, robes, outfits. and other accessories. Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire The Grotto, Sahuagin High Priestess's chest
Barovian Nobles' Regalia
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Exceptional Universal Spell Lore +3%Exceptional Universal Spell Lore: 3% Exceptional bonus to Universal Spell Lore.
  • Exceptional Universal Spell Power +8Exceptional Universal Spell Power +8: Passive: +8 Exceptional bonus to Universal Spell Power.
  • Fortification +77%Fortification +77%: +77% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Shield +6Shield +6: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +6 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Beacon of Magic Set (Heroic)Beacon of Magic Set (Heroic): 3 Pieces Equipped:
    +20 Artifact bonus to Universal Spell Power
    +1 Artifact bonus to all Spell DCs
    +5 Artifact bonus to Magical Resistance Rating
    Your Magical Resistance Rating cap is raised by +10
    +2% Artifact Bonus to Missile Deflection.
 10 +5 None 0 0% ClothCloth: Cloth is a very common material used in handwraps, robes, outfits. and other accessories. Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire An Invitation to Dinner, End chest, Challenge Strahd Again optional chest
Black Dragonscale Robe
  • Armor Bonus +8Armor Bonus +8: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +8 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Haste GuardHaste Guard: When you are hit by enemies, there is a chance you will be Hasted, quickening your attack and movement speed.
  • Armor-Piercing - 10% Armor-Piercing - 10%: Passive: +10% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.
  • Acid Resistance +30Acid Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Acid Resistance.
 14 0 None 0 0% Black DragonscaleBlack Dragonscale: Items crafted from the scales of black dragons often grant their owners resistance to damage from acid. Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Black Dragonscale Armor
Blue Dragonscale Robe
  • Armor Bonus +8Armor Bonus +8: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +8 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Spell Lore VISpell Lore VI: Passive: All of your spells gain a 6% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Spell Penetration II Spell Penetration II: Passive: +2 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
  • Potency +52Potency +52: Passive: +52 Equipment bonus to each Spell Power.
  • Electric Resistance +30Electric Resistance +30: Passive: +30 Enhancement bonus to your Electric Resistance.
 14 0 None 0 0% Blue DragonscaleBlue Dragonscale: Items crafted from the scales of blue dragons often grant their owners resistance to damage from electricity. Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Blue Dragonscale Armor
Brimstone Boulder Warden's Robe
  • +3 Enhancement Bonus+3 Enhancement Bonus: +3 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Spell Penetration +3 Spell Penetration +3: Passive: +3 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.
  • Constitution +4 Constitution +4: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
  • DuskDusk: Equipping this item engulfs you in twilight shadows. Attacks from enemies have a 10% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • Spell Resistance +12 Spell Resistance +12: +12 Enhancement bonus to Spell Resistance.

Cormyrian Green Dragonscale Robe
  • Armor Bonus +9Armor Bonus +9: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +9 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Vitality +20Vitality +20: Passive: +20 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • Acid Resistance +40Acid Resistance +40: Passive: +40 Enhancement bonus to your Acid Resistance.
  • Acid Absorption +20% Acid Absorption +20%: Passive: 20% Enhancement Bonus to Acid Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Resistance +6 Resistance +6: Passive: +6 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Proof Against Poison +10 Proof Against Poison +10: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +10 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 11 + their Fortitude save).
  • Power StorePower Store: This item collects and stores magical energy. Any spellcaster can use this energy to partially power their spells. All spells cast while using this item receive an enhancement bonus of -10% to their spell point costs.
 23 0 None 0 0% Green DragonscaleGreen Dragonscale: Items crafted from the scales of green dragons often grant their owners resistance to damage from poison. Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Mikrom Sum: Purple Dragon Knight Patron Vendor
Cormyrian Red Dragonscale Robe
  • Armor Bonus +9Armor Bonus +9: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +9 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Vitality +20Vitality +20: Passive: +20 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • Fire Resistance +40Fire Resistance +40: Passive: +40 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Fire Absorption +20% Fire Absorption +20%: Passive: 20% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Protection +6Protection +6: Passive: +6 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Seeker +10 Seeker +10: Provides a +10 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +10 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
 23 0 None 0 0% Red DragonscaleRed Dragonscale: Items crafted from the scales of fire dragons often grant their owners resistance to damage from fire. Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Mikrom Sum: Purple Dragon Knight Patron Vendor
Dampened Robe of Dissonance
  • DampenedDampened: This item has been in a wet environment for too long and its original power has been weakened. Combine it with a Token of Vulkoor at the Altar of Vulkoor in the Red Fens to restore it back to its former glory.
  • Sonic Resistance +3Sonic Resistance +3: Passive: +3 Enhancement bonus to your Sonic Resistance.
  • Sonic GuardSonic Guard: This item blasts those that attack the wearer, causing 1d6 sonic damage on a successful melee attack.
  • Resonance +48Resonance +48: Passive: +48 Equipment bonus to Sonic Spell Power.
  • Impulse +48Impulse +48: Passive: +48 Equipment bonus to Force, Untyped, Slashing, Piercing, and Bludgeoning Spell Power.

Dragoncraft Robe
  • Armor Bonus +5Armor Bonus +5: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +5 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Fortification +75%Fortification +75%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 75% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Protection +4Protection +4: Passive: +4 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Shield +4Shield +4: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +4 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.

  • Dodge +9% Dodge +9%: +9% Enhancement bonus to Dodge.

  • Eternal FireEternal Fire: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks gain the Flaming Burst ability. (This weapon is sheathed in fire. The weapon deals an additional 1 to 6 fire damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 fire damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 critical multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.)

  • Spell ResonanceSpell Resonance: This item hums ominously with suppressed energy. When casting Force spells, there is a chance that you will gain a +20 alchemical bonus to Force Spell Power for 30 seconds. When casting Sonic spells, there is a chance that you will gain a +20 alchemical bonus to Sonic Spell Power 30 seconds.

  • Fire Shield (Hot)Fire Shield (Hot): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Hot) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Cold) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.

  • Insightful Wizardry VPassive: +125 Insightful Bonus to Spell Points. (If you have Sorcerer or Favored Soul levels, you gain additional spell points proportionate to the ratio of those levels to other classes)

  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

  • Armor Bonus +10Armor Bonus +10: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +10 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Haste GuardHaste Guard: When you are hit by enemies, there is a chance you will be Hasted, quickening your attack and movement speed.
  • Armor-Piercing - 15% Armor-Piercing - 15%: Passive: +15% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.
  • Acid Resistance +40Acid Resistance +40: Passive: +40 Enhancement bonus to your Acid Resistance.

Flawless White Dragonscale Robe
  • Armor Bonus +10Armor Bonus +10: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +10 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Protection +7Protection +7: Passive: +7 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.

  • Incineration GuardIncineration Guard: This item stores the power of a raging inferno deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this destructive power occasionally comes to the surface, devastating enemies with massive fire damage.

Legendary Robe of Dissonance
  • +15 Enhancement Bonus+15 Enhancement Bonus: +15 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Spell ResonanceSpell Resonance: This item hums ominously with suppressed energy. When casting Force spells, there is a chance that you will gain a +20 alchemical bonus to Force Spell Power for 30 seconds. When casting Sonic spells, there is a chance that you will gain a +20 alchemical bonus to Sonic Spell Power 30 seconds.
  • SoundproofSoundproof: Protects against stunning, dazing and disorientation from sound-based spells such as Soundburst and Greater Shout.
  • Resonance +146Resonance +146: Passive: +146 Equipment bonus to Sonic Spell Power.

  • +15 Enhancement Bonus+15 Enhancement Bonus: +15 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Evocation Focus +6 Evocation Focus +6: +6 Equipment bonus to the DC of Evocation spells.
  • Fire Absorption +35% Fire Absorption +35%: Passive: 35% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • Fire Resistance +51Fire Resistance +51: Passive: +51 Enhancement bonus to your Fire Resistance.
  • Fire Shield (Hot)Fire Shield (Hot): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Hot) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Cold) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.
  • Quality Combustion +36Quality Combustion +36: Passive: +36 Quality bonus to Fire Spell Power.

When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, superheated magma occasionally surges to the surface, causing a tremendous amount of Fire damage to the attacker.

Legendary Ship-Mage's Attire
  • +15 Enhancement Bonus+15 Enhancement Bonus: +15 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • False Life +51 False Life +51: +51 Enhancement bonus to hit points.
  • Wizardry +277 Wizardry +277: +277 Enhancement bonus to spell points.
  • Greater Boon of UndeathGreater Boon of Undeath: Undead take solace in the hate of others. Every time a character wearing a Boon of Undeath item is struck in combat, an Inflict Moderate Wounds spell will be cast on the character.
  • Profane Lifeforce +45Profane Lifeforce +45: +45 Profane bonus to Hit Points.

Mantle of Escher
  • +15 Enhancement Bonus+15 Enhancement Bonus: +15 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Quicksilver Cassok
  • Armor Bonus +5Armor Bonus +5: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +5 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Striding +25%Striding +25%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 25% bonus to run speed.
  • Melee Alacrity 10%Melee Alacrity 10%: Gain 10% enhancement bonus to Melee attack speed. Does not stack with the Haste spell.
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)

Regalia of the Phoenix
  • Greater InfernoGreater Inferno: When Activated, this effect provides a +20 Alchemical bonus to Fire Spell Power for three minutes. - 3 Charges (Recharged/Day: 3)
  • Evocation Focus I Evocation Focus I: +1 Equipment bonus to the DC of Evocation spells.
  • Combustion +78Combustion +78: Passive: +78 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.
  • Fire Lore IIIFire Lore III: Passive: Your Fire spells gain a 13% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Feather FallingFeather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.
  • Suppressed PowerSuppressed Power: This psionic item is powerful, but you sense that it has not unlocked all of its secrets to you at this time.

Restored Dragoncraft Robe
  • Armor Bonus +9Armor Bonus +9: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +9 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
  • Protection +7Protection +7: Passive: +7 Deflection bonus to Armor Class.
  • Shield +6Shield +6: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +6 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.

Restored Giantcraft Robe
  • Armor Bonus +9Armor Bonus +9: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +9 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Haste GuardHaste Guard: When you are hit by enemies, there is a chance you will be Hasted, quickening your attack and movement speed.
  • Armor-Piercing - 15% Armor-Piercing - 15%: Passive: +15% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.

  • Fire Shield (Hot)Fire Shield (Hot): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Hot) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Cold) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.

  • Greater False LifeGreater False Life: This item grants the wearer +30 maximum health.

  • Fire Absorption +18% Fire Absorption +18%: Passive: 18% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)
  • BlurryBlurry: Equipping this item causes you to become slightly blurry. Attacks from enemies have a 20% chance to miss you due to concealment.
  • Fortification +70%Fortification +70%: +70% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Temple's InfernoTemple's Inferno: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +5 Artifact Bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +10 Artifact Bonus to Fire Spell Power
    +5% Artifact Bonus to Helplessness Damage

  • Shadow PhaseShadow Phase
    Caster level: 30
    Charges: 3 (3/day)     — 3 Charges (Recharged/Day:3)
  • Armor Bonus +10Armor Bonus +10: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +10 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • +11 Enhancement Bonus+11 Enhancement Bonus: +11 enhancement bonus to Armor Class.
  • DeathblockDeathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to all death spells and magical death effects.
  • Fortification +130%Fortification +130%: +130% Enhancement bonus to reduced chance of taking critical damage on a critical hit.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • From The ShadowsFrom The Shadows: On Being Missed in Combat: Chance to do 10 to 60 Negative Energy Damage to the Attacker.

    • Named: Category:Blue augments

      • Shadow Caster

  • Boon of UndeathBoon of Undeath: Undead take solace in the hate of others. Every time a character wearing a Boon of Undeath item is struck in combat, an Inflict Light Wounds spell will be cast on the character.
  • Void Lore VVoid Lore V: Passive: Your Negative Energy and Poison spells gain a 15% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.
  • Lightning Lore VLightning Lore V: Passive: Your Electricity spells gain a 15% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.

Bring this item to the Fountain of Necrotic Might outside the Black Mausoleum and combine it with a Seal of the Black Abbot to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.

Spider-spun Caparison
  • One of the following ability bonuses:
    • Dexterity +8 Dexterity +8: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
    • Insightful Dexterity +3Insightful Dexterity +3: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +3 insight bonus to Dexterity.
    • Wisdom +8 Wisdom +8: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
    • Insightful Wisdom +3Insightful Wisdom +3: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +3 insight bonus to Wisdom.
  • Armor Bonus +9Armor Bonus +9: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting +9 armor bonus to AC, just as though he were wearing armor.
  • Resistance +6 Resistance +6: Passive: +6 Resistance bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws.
  • Enhanced Ki +1Enhanced Ki +1: Increases the rate at which the user gains ki with each successful attack.
  • Reinforced FistsReinforced Fists: This item surrounds your fists with kinetic energy. Your unarmed damage is boosted by one half die.
  • Concentration +15Concentration +15: Passive: +15 Competence bonus to the Concentration skill.
  • Vitality +20Vitality +20: Passive: +20 Vitality bonus to Hit Points.
  • Upgrade:
    • 375 Purple Dragon Knights Favor and 15 Commendation: Villagers of Eveningstar adds Way of the Sun SoulWay of the Sun Soul: When all three item from the set are equipped and you are in a centered state, you will gain +2 artifact bonus to To-Hit and Damage rolls. In addition, when you roll a natural 20 on an attack roll that is confirmed as a critical hit, you will gain temporary benefit based on the elemental stance you are in, if any.

  • Fortification +100%Fortification +100%: This suit of armor or shield produces a magical force that protects vital areas of the wearer much more effectively. When a critical hit or sneak attack is scored on the wearer, there is a 100% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead rolled normally.
